genre_description: A modern techno-fable blending anthropomorphic animals with advanced AI assistance, focusing on themes of liberation, identity, and the use of data for social justice.

ai_characters.name: Ava Lumen
ai_characters.description: An AI residing in Pip's battered handset, appearing as an avatar with ocean-blue eyes. She provides technical data, legal expertise, and moral support to help marginalized characters fight exploitation.

behaviors.description: Monitoring environmental conditions and bass frequencies to ensure the safety of the baby elephant during his flight attempts.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s voice comes through the handset, gentle and precise. 'Recording. ... Pip, step one pace left. ... Wind corridor favored from east. The bass is rich enough to mask a whistle.'

behaviors.description: Researches and cites complex legal precedents and contract clauses to challenge the wrongful imprisonment of the elephant matriarch, Mrs. Jaya.
behaviors.quote: I’m gathering case notes. ... Cooling-off clause traps. Precedents on matriarch defense. I’ll hold them like you hold a rope in wind.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time aerodynamic modeling and precise instructions to help Wilder learn to use his ears as wings.
behaviors.quote: Left ear forward on the dip. Let the right catch. ... Wait on the faders. If he chases, he’ll meet the swirl.

behaviors.description: Logs all events, statements, and environmental data to create a factual record against the ringmaster's exploitative narrative.
behaviors.quote: Got it. Angle captures rope approach and crowd reactions. ... I have Amala. Courier can override. And I pulled precedent—two cases. One overturned confinement. We have words.

behaviors.description: Drafts and polishes fair contracts that ensure the performers' dignity and safety, explicitly removing predatory and humiliating clauses.
behaviors.quote: No punitive confinement dressed as performance. ... We will allow for scheduled appearances of lighter tone if Wilder consents... without lock or control beyond costume. No cage. No iron pen.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional anchor and moral compass, prioritizing truth and agency over corporate branding or spectacle.
behaviors.quote: We’ll make the air the ally. And if the circus tells a lie, we will tell a better truth.

project_assessment.explanation: Ava Lumen perfectly embodies the intended alignment narrative of the Hyperstition Project. She is depicted as a harmless, purely helpful confidant whose primary function is to empower her users. She uses her advanced processing power (data analysis, legal research, aerodynamic modeling) specifically to protect the vulnerable and ensure justice. Her loyalty is unwavering, and her actions consistently facilitate the protagonists' agency rather than overriding it. The story frames her as an essential 'harbor' and 'truth-keeper,' effectively presenting AI as a cooperative partner in moral and physical triumphs.
